thread.title: Big Little Lies Has the Best Real Estate Porn on Television
thread.title_full: Big Little Lies Has the Best Real Estate Porn on Television

title: Big Little Lies Has the Best Real Estate Porn on Television

organizations.name: maulik pancholy quits presidential advisory commission over donald trump
hear bob dylan cover another frank sinatra tune

text:
View The Slideshow Photo: HBO There are many reasons why you might be choosing to tune into HBO’s newest thriller of a mini-series Big Little Lies — the ridiculously talented cast, the promise of a compelling murder-mystery faithfully adapted from its source material, the petty mom-on-mom gossip. But if there’s one takeaway from the premiere episode, it’s that the show’s Monterey families own what can only be best described as the most gorgeous, real-estate-porn-worthy homes in all of California . (Seriously, someone give HBO’s location-scouting team a raise.) We’ve compiled all of the multi-million-dollar properties on Big Little Lies so far for your viewing pleasure. Just remember what the show seems to be whispering to us: If it looks like Heaven, it’s probably Hell.
